GraphRendererVisitor Class Reference

#include <GraphRendererVisitor.h>

Detailed Description

This class implements the scene graph traversal in depth first order with backtracking and uses the visitor pattern.

Member Function Documentation

void GraphRendererVisitor::discover_vertex ( vertex_descriptor  v,
const graph_type &  g 
)

Parameters:
v a vertex index which points to which vertex/node is discovered

Parameters:
g a reference to the graph being traversed this method is called by the depth first traversal algorithm every time a node is discovered it builds the graph string as a stream

Definition at line 13 of file GraphRendererVisitor.cpp.

void GraphRendererVisitor::finish_vertex ( vertex_descriptor  v,
const graph_type &  g 
)

Parameters:
v a vertex index which points to which vertex/node is discovered

Parameters:
g a reference to the graph being traversed this method is called by the traversal algorithm whenever a vertex/node descendants have all been discovered it indicates that the traversal is backtracking
